t: Bobby Berk – BURKE DECOR
s: Epitomizing hip, minimalist urban luxury, Bobby Berk’s designs reflect a stylish and youthful spirit that perfectly fits any cool, relaxed lifestyle. His past season’s were inspired by mid-century modernism, taking ideas from the colors and shapes of the 50s, 60s, and 70s.
